price: Sunã gincire a kan waɗansu shimfiɗu cikinsu tufãfin alharĩni mai kauri ne kuma nũnannun 'yã'yan itãcen Aljannar biyu kusakusa suke.
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشِۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنۡ إِسۡتَبۡرَقٖۚ وَجَنَى ٱلۡجَنَّتَيۡنِ دَانٖ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā furushin baṭāinuhā min is'tabraqin wajanā al-janatayni dānin
